tool.name: Stanford POS Tagger
tool.description: Part of Speech Tagging Using Stadford Parser

param.name: exclude_line
param.label: Provide the line/sentence to be excluded
param.help: This indicates the line to be excluded, which usually needs to be the same as the file delimiter in Dataset Merger if the input to this tool is from Dataset Merger. Do not include space.

param.name: wordtag_delimiter
param.label: Choose the delimiter for word and its tag, e.g. word|NN
param.help: Word-Tag delimiter is used to separate each word with its tag, for example, if the pipe | is used as the delimiter, then an output can be word|NN.

tool.help:
**What it does**
This is the python wrapper if Stanford POS Tagger. You need to provide a model file which have an extension .tagger, and a POS Tagger .jar file.
For more information, please refer: https://nlp.stanford.edu/software/tagger.shtml
-----
.. class:: infomark
This tool will only work on properly formatted .txt datasets.
-----
**Example 1**
**WARNING:** This tool will only work on properly formatted .txt datasets, it does not change the contexts of the text files.
